import React from "react"; export const ModalAddNewProject = () => { React.useEffect(()=> { const exampleModal = document.getElementById("exampleModal"); exampleModal.addEventListener("show.bs.modal", (event) => { // Button that triggered the modal const button = event.relatedTarget; // Extract info from data-bs-* attributes const recipient = button.getAttribute("data-bs-whatever"); // If necessary, you could initiate an AJAX request here // and then do the updating in a callback. // // Update the modal's content. const modalTitle = exampleModal.querySelector(".modal-title"); const modalBodyInput = exampleModal.querySelector(".modal-body input"); modalTitle.textContent = `New message to ${recipient}`; modalBodyInput.value = recipient; }); }); return (

New message

); };
